body.name: Home Office Desk with 2 Drawers, Computer Writing Desk with Polished Gold Handle, White
features: 【White Home Office Desk】 - This wood writing desk gives you an enjoyable space to concentrate on working. Elegant white finish with complementary polished gold handle.The white desk with drawers brings classic beauty to any room, which is definitely great decor for your room. Our desk is perfect for a small space.
【Abudant Storage Space】 - Feature with 2 large sliding drawers can provide enough storage space for book, pens, jewelry and so on, making your desktop clean and tidy.It can also be a makeup table.

【Versatile Use】 - This desk suitable for study rooms, bedrooms, living rooms, studios. It can be used as a learning table, writing desk, computer desk, console table, work table, vanity desk or home office workstation.

【Durable and Stable】 - The engineered wood boards combine with rubber wood legs give it a solid structure as well as a beautiful appearance.Additionally, the thickened board increases additional load capacity for prolonged service life.

【Perfect Size & Simple Maintenance】 - 29.8" H x 18"D x 39.5"W Easy assemble with provided instructions and hardware.The smooth surface with delicate finish is convenient to clean in daily life, just gently wipe it with a soft cloth.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Satisfactory Storage Space This BALDPER 2-drawer writing desk is the perfect option for any home, office, or dorm room. The simple design and frame legs will save you space, while still providing plenty of room for your books, laptop, tablet, or mail. The two drawers add additional storage space for things you'd like to keep tucked away. If you have two of these desk you can place them back to back to create an extra-large work island.

Drawer Design Minimalist lines decorated drawers with gold handles Drawer Storage Divider Improve storage space utilization and neatness Functional 2 Accessory drawers offer ample storage Sturdy Solid Wood Legs Have enough support and stability to accompany you for many more years

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant and Functional
reviews.reviewText: As someone who spends a significant amount of time at a desk, I can truly appreciate the importance of having a workspace that is both stylish and practical. That's why I was thrilled to come across the White Desk with Gold Handles. This desk effortlessly combines sophistication with functionality, making it a standout piece in any room.First and foremost, let's talk about the design. The white finish exudes a sense of cleanliness and modernity, instantly brightening up the space it occupies. The addition of gold handles adds a touch of glamour and elevates the overall aesthetic to new heights. It's a perfect blend of classic and contemporary design elements.In terms of functionality, this desk doesn't disappoint either. With two spacious drawers, it offers ample storage space for all your essentials without compromising on its sleek appearance. Whether it's pens, notebooks, or other office supplies, everything can be neatly tucked away, helping to keep your workspace clutter-free and organized.The mid-size of the desk is also worth noting. It strikes the perfect balance between being compact enough for smaller rooms or home offices while still providing enough surface area for working comfortably. Whether you're typing away on your laptop or sketching out ideas, there's plenty of room to spread out and get things done.Another aspect worth mentioning is the quality of construction. The desk feels sturdy and well-built, promising years of reliable use. From the smooth glide of the drawers to the solid feel of the handles, every detail has been carefully crafted with durability in mind.Overall, I couldn't be more pleased with the White Desk with Gold Handles. It's a beautiful piece of furniture that not only enhances the look of my workspace but also helps me stay organized and productive. If you're in the market for a desk that combines style and function effortlessly, look no further than this elegant gem. Highly recommended!
